_header: Ne shalt thou never lady twinklen with thine eyen
Note: Possibly scraps of three unrelated love songs.
_description: Love lyric of ten lines, signed ‘Robertus seynte Mary Clericus’

WorcQ50.Transcription:
Ne saltou neuer leuedi tuynklen wyt þin eyenhit abbe ydon al myn
                    youthofte ofte ant ofte longe yloued ant yerne y beden ful dere it his a
                    boutSore go þou stille go þou stillee þat hit abbe in
                    þe boure ydon al myn uyllee
